pageNotFound.second: The page you are looking for has been moved or deleted.

applicationSection.text: If you need to raise funds, you can submit an application on the website, and we will help organize the fundraiser.
applicationSection.title: Submit an Application

message.max: Please shorten your message to 300 characters

name.empty: Name cannot consist of only spaces
name.invalid_chars: Name can only contain allowed characters
name.min: Name must be at least 2 characters

cardDonation.description: Every Friday your company can collect small change after lunch. Even small amounts of money can change the lives of many people. Simply collect the funds in a special box or transfer them to our account. Try practicing this with your whole team or department. Don’t forget to report the results once a month, and you'll be amazed at how significant your help can be. The larger the company, the more vulnerable the object of support. Choose an animal shelter or a small local project to support and feel their gratitude.
cardDonation.title: Small change from lunches

corporateFridays.description: Make it a habit to contribute the change from your coffee or pizza to a single card or a jointly chosen fund. Even a few euro will unite your company into a team, and meetings will become warmer and more meaningful. Choose a project that is close to you mentally or professionally. Support a small pet project with funds for technical equipment or a local art community. Focus on projects with long-term impact, and one day you will be able to say: 'I am part of it too!'
corporateFridays.title: Shared donations during meetings with friends

weeklyLoteries.description: Every Friday in the office, you can organize a giveaway of small pleasant items or useful things: a book related to your field, a new mouse, or a set of stickers. The main thing is consistency and usefulness for the recipient. After a month, see how small amounts have turned into significant help. Choose one project or one direction and track its progress throughout the year – from season to season.
weeklyLoteries.title: Office auction

eventsSection.subtitle: Support us your way: Choose your donation method
eventsSection.title: Events

helpNowSection.title-p-1: We are also grateful for the support of Baza Trainee Ukraine.
helpNowSection.title-p-2: This allows us to support even more participants on their professional development journey.

qASection.imageAlt: Photo of the V.G. Korolenko Chernihiv Regional Library

authenticity_of_request.answer: Each request must include mandatory details: purpose, objective, deadlines, project partners, etc. If you do not see clearly specified criteria, ask about them directly.
authenticity_of_request.title: How can I determine the authenticity of a request for help?

important_for_launching.answer: A clearly defined goal, the description of which requires no further questions, transparency in reporting, and the ability to monitor the project's progress – for example, the target of a donation box, the stated and collected amount.
important_for_launching.title: What is the most important when launching a charity project?

informational_component_in_charity_proje.answer: It is crucial. Transparency and clarity of information are the first steps of the project that build the most important factor – trust in the organization.
informational_component_in_charity_proje.title: How important is the informational component in a charity project?

project_does_not_involve_fundraising.answer: In that case, you have the right to request photo reports of the project's activities from the organizers. Reputational gains are just as important as financial results.
project_does_not_involve_fundraising.title: What if the project does not involve fundraising but focuses on gathering volunteers?

types_of_requests.answer: Personal — from an individual, local — from a community, thematic — for ongoing support of an art project, for example, or governmental. You can determine the project's scale by identifying its partners.
types_of_requests.title: What types of requests for help exist?
